sentences: See oli minu kolmas kord selles linnas.
context: 'Kolmas' is the ordinal number form of '3' in Estonian, meaning 'third'. It's used to indicate position in a sequence or order. The word declines according to Estonian grammar rules and appears in various contexts like dates (kolmas kuu - third month), positions (kolmas rida - third row), rankings (kolmandaks tulla - to come in third place), and fractions (kolmandik - one third). It can also refer to the third person or entity in different contexts.
